name: <panicking::begin_panic::Payload<A> as core::panic::PanicPayload>::take_box

alloc_crate::boxed::Box::<T>::new.doc:
Allocates memory on the heap and then places `x` into it.

 This doesn't actually allocate if `T` is zero-sized.

 # Examples

 ```
 let five = Box::new(5);
 ```
